import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var userToken=localStorage.getItem('token')?JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('token')):'';// const userStore = localStorage.getItem('user') ? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')): null
var authSlice=createSlice({name:'auth',initialState:{user:null,loading:null,er:null,isAuth:false,token:userToken},reducers:{userRequest:function userRequest(state,action){state.loading=true;},userLogin:function userLogin(state,action){state.loading=false;state.user=action.payload;state.isAuth=true;},tokes:function tokes(state,action){state.token=action.payload.token;},userFail:function userFail(state,action){state.er=action.payload;state.loading=false;state.user=null;state.isAuth=false;},userRegister:function userRegister(state,action){state.user=action.payload;state.loading=false;state.isAuth=true;},userLogout:function userLogout(state,action){state.loading=false;state.user=null;state.token=localStorage.removeItem('token');state.isAuth=false;},loadUser:function loadUser(state,action){state.loading=false;state.user=action.payload;state.isAuth=true;state.er=null;},loadUserFail:function loadUserFail(state,action){state.loading=false;state.user=null;state.isAuth=false;state.er=action.payload;}}});export var authAction=authSlice.actions;export var authReducer=authSlice;
